cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kichou

sentence.kanji: 彼は貴重な体験をしたわね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kichou na taiken wo shita wa ne
sentence.english: He had a valuable experience.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kichouhin

sentence.kanji: 貴重品は自分で持っていてください。
sentence.romaji: kichouhin ha jibun de mote ite kudasai
sentence.english: Please take your valuables with you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toutoi

sentence.kanji: その事故で貴い命が失われました。
sentence.romaji: sono jiko de toutoi inochi ga ushinawaremashita
sentence.english: A precious life was lost in the accident.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kijun

sentence.kanji: この建物は建築の基準に達していないよ。
sentence.romaji: kono tatemono ha kenchiku no kijun ni tashiteinai yo 。
sentence.english: This building doesn't meet the construction standards.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mamonaku

sentence.kanji: あの飛行機は間も無く着陸しますね。
sentence.romaji: ano hikouki ha mamonaku chakuriku shimasu ne
sentence.english: That airplane will land soon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼女の親切に甘えました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no shinsetsu ni amaemashita
sentence.english: I depended on her kindness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amayakasu

sentence.kanji: 子供を甘やかしてはいけないの。
sentence.romaji: kodomo wo amayakashiteha ikenai no
sentence.english: You must not spoil children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mugai

sentence.kanji: この農薬は人には無害です。
sentence.romaji: kono nouyaku ha hito ni ha mugai desu
sentence.english: This agricultural chemical is harmless to humans.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's enki

sentence.kanji: 運動会は雨で延期されました。
sentence.romaji: undoukai ha ame de enki saremashita
sentence.english: The athletic meet was postponed due to rain.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's museibutsu

sentence.kanji: 岩は無生物に分類される。
sentence.romaji: iwa ha museibutsu ni bunrui sareru
sentence.english: Rocks are classified as inanimate matter.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotobazukai

sentence.kanji: 先生にそんな言葉遣いをしてはいけません。
sentence.romaji: sensei ni sonna kotobazukai wo shite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Do not speak to the teacher like that.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mushi

sentence.kanji: 彼の意見は無視されたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare no iken ha mushi sareta yo
sentence.english: His opinion was disregarded.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's musekinin

sentence.kanji: 無責任な行動は許されません。
sentence.romaji: musekinin na koudou ha yurusaremasen
sentence.english: Irresponsible behavior will not be tolerated.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouki

sentence.kanji: 後期の授業が始まりました。
sentence.romaji: kouki no jugyou ga hajimarimashita
sentence.english: The classes for the final term started.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kichi

sentence.kanji: ここは昔、軍事基地でした。
sentence.romaji: koko ha mukashi gunji kichi deshita
sentence.english: This used to be a military base.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muriyari

sentence.kanji: 荷物を無理やりかばんに詰めたよ。
sentence.romaji: nimotsu wo muriyari kaban ni tsumeta yo
sentence.english: I forced my belongings into the bag.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koki

sentence.kanji: 日本の国旗は描くのが簡単です。
sentence.romaji: nihon no koki ha kaku no ga kantan desu
sentence.english: It is easy to draw the national flag of Japan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiso

sentence.kanji: 今ドイツ語の基礎を学んでいます。
sentence.romaji: ima doitsugo no kiso wo manande imasu
sentence.english: We are learning the basics of German at the moment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanjou

sentence.kanji: お勘定をして下さい。
sentence.romaji: okanjou wo shite kudasai
sentence.english: Can I have the check, please?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kan

sentence.kanji: 女の勘を甘く見てはいけません。
sentence.romaji: onna no kan wo amaku mite ha ikemasen
sentence.english: Don't underestimate a woman's intuition.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanchigai

sentence.kanji: 待ち合わせは2時だと勘違いしていました。
sentence.romaji: machiawase ha niji da to kanchigai shite imashita
sentence.english: I mistakenly thought the meeting was at two o'clock.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shochuumimai

sentence.kanji: 先生に暑中見舞いを出しました。
sentence.romaji: sensei ni shochuumimai wo dashimashita
sentence.english: I sent a summer greeting card to my teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oshimai

sentence.kanji: 話はこれでお仕舞いです。
sentence.romaji: hanashi ha kore de oshimai desu
sentence.english: This is the end of the talk.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's butai

sentence.kanji: その物語は京都が舞台だ。
sentence.romaji: sono monogatari ha kyouto ga butai da
sentence.english: The story is set in Kyoto.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mimau

sentence.kanji: 昨日友人を見舞ったの。
sentence.romaji: kinou yuujin wo mimata no
sentence.english: I went to visit a friend in hospital yesterday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mimai

sentence.kanji: 友達が見舞いに来てくれたよ。
sentence.romaji: tomodachi ga mimai ni kite kureta yo
sentence.english: My friend came to visit me in hospital.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanazukai

sentence.kanji: 祖父は古い仮名遣いで書くことがあるの。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha furui kanazukai de kaku koto ga aru no
sentence.english: My grandfather sometimes writes in the old kana orthography.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoki

sentence.kanji: 鼻水は風邪の初期症状のひとつです。
sentence.romaji: hanamizu ha kaze no shoki shoujou no hitotsu desu
sentence.english: A runny nose is one of the initial symptoms of a cold.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kon

sentence.kanji: 日本の制服は紺が多いね。
sentence.romaji: nihon no seifuku ha kon ga ooi ne
sentence.english: Many school uniforms in Japan are navy blue.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsubusu

sentence.kanji: ペットボトルは潰して捨てましょう。
sentence.romaji: petobotoru ha tsubushite sutemashou
sentence.english: You should crush plastic bottles before throwing them away.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsubureru

sentence.kanji: 箱の角が潰れていますよ。
sentence.romaji: hako no kado ga tsuburete imasu yo
sentence.english: The corner of the box is squashed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teiki

sentence.kanji: 定期演奏会は年に4回あります。
sentence.romaji: teikiensoukai ha nen ni 4 kai arimasu
sentence.english: There are regular concerts four times a year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kabuki

sentence.kanji: 歌舞伎の芝居を見に行きました。
sentence.romaji: kabuki no shibai wo mi ni ikimashita 。
sentence.english: I went to see a kabuki play.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gobusata

sentence.kanji: 長いこと御無沙汰いたしました。
sentence.romaji: nagai koto gobusata itashimashita
sentence.english: I have been out of touch with you for a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jugyou

sentence.kanji: 今日は日本語の授業があります。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha nihongo no jugyou ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's going to be a Japanese class today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kodomo

sentence.kanji: 電車で子供が騒いでいた。
sentence.romaji: densha de kodomo ga sawaide ita
sentence.english: Kids were making a racket in the train.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's boku

sentence.kanji: 僕は学生です。
sentence.romaji: boku ha gakusei desu
sentence.english: I'm a student.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougyou

sentence.kanji: そこは工業都市だ。
sentence.romaji: soko ha kougyou toshi da
sentence.english: That's an industrial city.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sagyou

sentence.kanji: 作業するにはもっと広いスペースが必要だ。
sentence.romaji: sagyou suru ni ha moto hiroi supe-su ga hitsuyou da
sentence.english: I need a bigger space to work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigyou

sentence.kanji: 彼女はアメリカの企業で働いています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha amerika no kigyou de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: She works in an American company.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sangyou

sentence.kanji: 日本の自動車産業は世界的に有名だ。
sentence.romaji: nihon no jidousha sangyou ha sekaiteki ni yuumei da
sentence.english: The Japanese auto industry is famous worldwide.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futsuu

sentence.kanji: 彼女は普通の女の子だ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha futsuu no onna no ko da
sentence.english: She's just a normal girl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's narabu

sentence.kanji: ここに並んでください。
sentence.romaji: koko ni narande kudasai
sentence.english: Please line up here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's naraberu

sentence.kanji: 私は料理をテーブルに並べた。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha ryouri wo te-buru ni narabeta
sentence.english: I arranged the food on the table.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuukou

sentence.kanji: 空港までリムジンバスで行った。
sentence.romaji: kuukou made rimujin basu de ita
sentence.english: I went to the airport by shuttle bus.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's minato

sentence.kanji: 港に船が着きました。
sentence.romaji: minato ni fune ga tsukimashita
sentence.english: The ship arrived at the port.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kotonaru

sentence.kanji: 彼と私はいつも意見が異なる。
sentence.romaji: kare to watashi ha itsumo iken ga kotonaru
sentence.english: He and I always have different opinions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chousa

sentence.kanji: 私たちがその問題を調査しています。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ga sono mondai wo chousa shite imasu
sentence.english: We're investigating that problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's teikyou

sentence.kanji: 彼がパーティー会場を提供してくれました。
sentence.romaji: kare ga pa-tei- kaijou wo teikyou shite kuremashita
sentence.english: He provided us with the venue for the party.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's erabu

sentence.kanji: 良い家を選ぶのは難しい。
sentence.romaji: yoi ie wo erabu no ha muzukashii
sentence.english: It's difficult to choose a good house.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senshu

sentence.kanji: 彼はプロのサッカー選手だ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha puro no saka- senshu da
sentence.english: He's a professional soccer player.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soshiki

sentence.kanji: 彼はある組織のリーダーだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha aru soshiki no ri-da- da
sentence.english: He's the leader of a certain organization.
